lexUnit.name: rumor.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: be circulated as a rumour.

sentence.text: The traditionally parsimonious Florentines , always depressed by the appearance of the Boboli Gardens , are furious about the forthcoming entry charge ( L2000 is rumoured as likely ) in spite of vaunted annual concessions for residents .
DEC /Fujitsu discussions are now rumoured as ` over " -- Fujitsu is not dumping Sparc , but would have loved to go to Alpha instead -- two to three years ago .
Mr Morton has long been rumoured as a possible successor to Sir Bob Reid at British Rail .
Two coup attempts have been rumoured in recent months .

Khatami 's resignation had been rumoured for some months , as conservative newspapers had accused him of " leniency " towards the " corrupt , Westernized " Iranian intellectuals and artists , especially those in exile .
The existence of the wolves , rumoured for years , was confirmed when two were shot by farmers while attacking calves .
It is even rumoured that the end of September is the deadline for the Government 's decision .
It was rumoured that the relationship had at times been stormy .
Frank Sinatra was rumoured to have enlisted the Mafia to help secure his first major serious acting role ( see The Godfather ) .
The Alte Pinakothek in Munich was also rumoured to be a potential buyer at one time .
At Liverpool clubs , the toilets are full of catsuited girls who look at you as if you 're rumoured to be a child molester .
Lists of ` intolerable " local leaders of Party , Labour Front , and NSV were also rumoured to have been drawn up .
No crimes are ever reported in the Magic Kingdom -- and it 's even rumoured that fatal heart attack victims are smuggled out so their deaths can be recorded off the park .
Her jut-jawed spouse , 41 , once voted the sexiest man in the world , is also rumoured to have other love interests .
It is rumoured to be the inspiration for Virginia Woolfe 's novel , The Lighthouse , since she spent her childhood nearby .
At one time , it had been rumoured that he was being groomed to be the next Commissioner .
In the back were two girls , driven by Charlie 's manager , the Fish , a tall , straight-backed and handsome ex-public school boy whose father was rumoured to be a Navy admiral .
